articles.title: New Gene-Editing Tool Targets Mutations with Unmatched Precision - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A breakthrough tool called Helicase-Assisted Continuous Editing (HACE) allows scientists to create precise genetic mutations in specific genes without affecting the rest of the genome.
